column3: ――いましばし――休息を許せ――
column4: ...For a moment more... allow me respite...

column3:
――いや、眠っていたわけではない
ただ、時折――意識が失せるのだ
column4:
Nay, 'twas not slumber that held me...
But at times... my awareness doth wane.

column3:
――ううむ、覚者よ
そなたはまだ新たな契約を交わす段階にあらず
すでに己が器に応じた数の戦徒を統べているようだ
column4:
...Mmm, Arisen.
Thou hast not yet reached the time
to bind a new accord.
It appeareth thou already governest
the full measure of pawns thy vessel can hold.

column3: ――どうした
column4: ...What aileth thee?

column3:
――よかろう
力を授かるべき者よ、我が前に――
column4:
...Very well.
Thou who art worthy of power,
stand before me...

column3:
――覚者よ
どうやらまだ、戦徒との新たな契約に
必要な数の<COL b92828><SPAI NAME></COL>を
持ってはおらぬようだな
column4:
...Arisen,
by mine eyes, thou hast not yet acquired
the needed amount of <COL b92828><SPAI NAME></COL>
to form a new covenant with a pawn.

column3: "悪しき竜"からの接触はないのか？
column4: Hath the fell Dragon not reached out to thee?

column3:
"悪しき竜"が持つ竜力の行方が
アッカーシェランの未来を決めることに
なるだろう
column4:
The dragon's might possessed by the evil Dragon
shall decide what future awaits Acre Selund.

column3:
"悪しき竜"が竜力を手放すとは思えん
となれば力尽くで奪うことになるのだろうか
果たして可能だろうか――
column4:
The fell Dragon wouldst 
ne'er surrender its strength...
Thus, must it be taken by might alone?
Could such a task be wrought...?

column3:
"悪しき竜"にはおごりがあるようだ
まるで人間のようだな
それがあやつの弱点かもしれない
column4:
The fell Dragon showeth arrogance—
much like unto a human.
Mayhap this be its frailty.

column3:
"悪しき竜"にはおごりがあるようだ
まるで人間のようだな
それがあやつの弱点かもしれない
column4:
The fell Dragon showeth arrogance—
much like unto a human.
Mayhap this be its frailty.

column3:
"悪しき竜"の思惑がどうであれ
その竜力はネド王子が継承可能となれば
目指す道はひとつだな

"悪しき竜"の気配はないか――
気の乱れを見逃すなよ
column4:
Doth no trace of the accursed Dragon linger...?
Mark well the subtle shifts of the aether.

column3: "悪しき竜"の目的が見えぬ
column4: The purpose of the fell Dragon remaineth unseen.

column3: "悪しき竜"はまだ動かぬか――
column4: Doth the fell Dragon yet stir not...?

column3:
"悪しき竜"をよく見ておいてくれ
同じことがこの地に起こらないとは
言えないからな
column4:
Fix thy watchful gaze upon the malevolent Dragon,
for naught may guarantee this 
land shall be spared its woe.

column3: 《原始の雫》――はて、知らぬわ
column4: The Primeval Drop...—alas, 'tis unknown to me.

column3:
あと少し――生かしてくれ――
やり残した――ことが――
column4:
But a moment more...
Let me abide...
There be deeds...
left unfinished...

column3: あれから３００年以上の時が過ぎている――
column4:
O'er three centuries have 
fled since that hour...

column3:
いよいよ"悪しき竜"の本拠を目指すと聞く
気の変化を見逃すなよ
column4:
Thou art bound for the fell 
Dragon's stronghold at last—
Overlook not the tremors in the very air.

column3:
おまえが"悪しき竜"ならどうする
野放しにしておくだろうか――
column4:
If thou wert the accursed Dragon, 
how wouldst thou act?
Wouldst thou leave them unbridled...?

column3:
おまえたちの勝利は"悪しき竜"の思惑に
どう影響するのか――
column4:
How doth thy conquest influence 
the plots of the fell Dragon...?

column3:
このレスタニアを竜なき世界にすることだけは
避けねばならぬ――
column4:
This realm of Lestania, thou must with 
steadfast heart prevent its fall to 
Dragonless ruin...

column3:
さあ、行くがよい
ここは――わたしはもう大丈夫だ
column4:
Go hence, now—
Here I stay... I fare well enough.

column3:
しかし、覚者よ――学ぶがよい
人の思いは、時に、竜をも狂わせるのだ
column4:
But mark thee well, Arisen—
Know that the hearts of men
at times hath madness to unmake dragons.

column3:
しばし眠るが――
まどろみの中でも、気の変化はわかる
――案ずることはない
column4:
E'en midst thy dreams, the winds' change
is known unto me—
Worry not...

column3:
そうか――黒い鎧の騎士は
姿を見せぬか
column4:
Is it so... the knight clad in black armor
showeth not his visage?

column3:
その掌握は我が手に余る
目を離すなよ
column4:
The mastery thereof is beyond me—
Turn not thine gaze away.

column3: そろそろ姿を現すかもしれないぞ
column4:
'Tis like the moment approacheth 
when the hidden form shall show itself.

column3:
ふむ――
我が力、自覚以上に失われているようだ
column4:
Hmmm...
It seemeth my power hath waned 
more than I had reckoned.

column3: ふむ――いいだろう――
column4: Hmmm... so be it...

column3:
ふむ――匂いが変わったな
彼の地の竜力は焼けた匂いがする
column4:
Hmmm... the air's scent doth alter,
the power of dragons there reeketh of fire.

column3: ふむ――異郷の匂いがするぞ
column4: Hmmm... a scent most foreign doth reach me.

column3:
ふん――
レオめ――
column4: Hmm... Leo...

column3:
よもやとは思うが――
ネド王子の言動に気をつけるがよい
column4:
Perchance 'tis folly to think, yet—
Beware thou well the words 
and deeds of Prince Nedo.

column3: わたしには休息が必要だ
column4: I am in need of reprieve.

column3:
アッカーシェランの幼き覚者を守り
覚者の道を教えられるのは
おまえたちの他にはいない
column4:
To guard the young Arisen of Acre Selund,
and to guide them upon the path of the Arisen,
none but thee are fit.

column3:
アッカーシェランの習わしでは
王子が竜を継ぐはずだ
column4:
'Tis the law of Acre Selund,
that the prince shall take up the dragon's legacy.

column3:
セシリーは覚者ではあるが
未だ途上の覚者――
我が覚者よ――その原因を探すのだ
column4:
Though Cecily be an Arisen,
she remaineth yet untried in her journey—
My Arisen, thou must uncover the reason.

column3:
フィンダムの竜への敬意――
けして忘れてはならぬ
column4:
The reverence due unto Phyndim's Dragon... 
Let it ne'er wane.

column3:
フィンダムの竜を見よ
意識が途切れ――乱れているようだ
column4:
Look to Phyndim's mighty Dragon...
Thy thoughts break—adrift they are.

column3: ミシアル――
column4: Mysial—

column3: 人は竜と大地の下僕のように思えるかもしれない
column4: Men may seem but thralls to Dragon and land...

column3: 全てを見通すことはまだ――できぬか――
column4:
To see through all things...
Thou art not yet able...

column3:
去った者のことは忘れることだ
頼りたいと思った時――
おまえの負けが決まるだろう
column4:
Cast aside thoughts of the departed...
If thou wouldst lean upon them—
thy downfall is certain.

column3: 声が――聞こえる――
column4: A voice... I hear...

column3:
大きな戦いの時は"悪しき竜"の動向に
気を配るのだ
column4:
In the hour of strife, 
watch well the fell Dragon's course...

column3:
大切な話がある
心身ともに健やかな時に――頼む
column4:
I bear tidings of grave import...  
Let it be when thou art hale in mind and form.

column3:
契約に必要な数、<COL b92828><SPAI NUM> 個</COL>を手に入れてのち
再び我にその証を示すがよい――
column4:
Gather the tally demanded by the covenant, 
<COL b92828><SPAI NUM> in count</COL>, 
then return and lay bare thy token before mine eyes.

column3:
常ならぬ気配は弱まるどころかさらに強くなる
あの娘が強い気を発してるが
それだけではない――
column4:
The unnatural presence doth not wane—
nay, it groweth ever stronger...
The maiden exudes a mighty force, yet...
That alone accounteth not for all—
There is more at play, unseen.

column3: 幸い竜力はすべて戻ったようだ
column4: By fortune, all Dragon's might hath returned.

column3:
広く伝えよ――
覚者にならんと思う者――我は拒まぬ
column4:
Let all hear this truth...
Who wouldst become Arisen...
I shall deny them not...

column3:
後悔の渦に足を取られるな
前を見た者だけが川を渡ることができるのだ
column4:
Succumb not to the vortex of lament—  
The river yieldeth passage only 
to those who see beyond.

column3:
悪意は消えぬ――
そこかしこの闇に潜む黒き悪意――
column4:
Malevolence doth not fade...  
Dark intent lurketh in every shadow.

column3: 惑いし者よ、畏れずに眼（まなこ）を開け
column4:
O thou who art lost, fear not—
open thine eyes.

column3:
我が加護を、おまえたちの言葉に乗せて
民たちに運ぶのだ
column4:
Carry my blessing upon thy words...  
Bear it forth unto the people.

column3: 我が奪われし竜力はまだか――
column4: Mine lost power yet lie beyond reach...

column3:
我が肉体が潤えばじきに大地も
元に戻るだろう
column4:
As my body reneweth,  
so too shall the realm thrive...

column3:
我にとっても短くはない時間だ
いわんや、人間にとっては――
column4:
Not a brief span hath it been for me,
and much less so for mortal men...

column3:
敵の狙いが見えぬ――
理に傷を付け何を求めるのか――
column4:
The foe's design is shrouded...  
What desire moveth them  
to sunder sacred law...

column3:
敵意――悪意――我ら竜が最も鋭敏に
感じる意識だ
column4: Enmity... Malevolence... The force most vividly felt by we of Dragon's blood...

column3: 沈黙こそ我が意力の糧――
column4:
In silence doth my power find 
its strength...

column3:
波を感じる――
はるか遠く、地平の彼方――
column4:
The waves do stir...
Far yonder, beyond where thine eyes reach...

column3:
漂う穢れた気は――
魔物どもが発するもののようだ
column4:
Drifting defilement...  
The noisome breath
of the fell spawn of fiends...

column3:
王子の持つ笛とはいかなる理が
はたらくものなのだろうか――
column4:
What principle doth govern  
the flute the Prince doth hold...

column3:
王子の行動は自信と確信に満ちている
そうは思わないか？
column4:
The Prince's deeds art brimming  
with surety and steadfast resolve.  

Dost thou not perceive  
his unwavering conviction?

column3:
王子は、黒い竜に倒されたとする火竜と
如何ほどの時を過ごしたのだろうか――
column4:
How long a span hath the Prince  
passed with the fallen Fire Dragon...

column3:
理の揺らぎを感じる――
何が起こるというのか――
column4:
The laws of order waver...  

What unseen force  
hath set the world askew...

column3:
異国の娘から目を離すな――
罪はなくとも、災いを呼び寄せるのはあの娘だ
column4:
Watch with vigilance  
the daughter of distant lands...  

Though no sin stains her,  
misfortune heedeth her call...

column3:
異変の原因は大地の病か――
ふむ――
覚者たちよ――これは根深いぞ――
column4:
Doth the ailment of the land  
give rise to this great turmoil...  
Hmm...  
Arisen, beware...  
The roots of this plague run deep..

column3:
目下の敵の向こうに真の敵がいるはずだ
その姿を見逃すでないぞ
column4:
Beyond the foe before thee  
lurks the true adversary...  
Let not thine eyes waver,  
lest his form elude thy sight...

column3: 真に強き魂あらば、闇は消え去る――
column4:
If thou possesseth a soul of true 
strength, the darkness shall be 
banished...

column3:
竜と大地と民――
崩れた均衡を調和の中に戻すのは
難しい――心して、事に当たれ
column4:
Dragon, land, and kin—  
To mend the shattered balance  
within harmony is no simple task...  
Steel thy spirit,  
and face thy duty with resolve...

column3: 竜なき世界――
column4: A world bereft of Dragons...

column3:
竜に意識を向けろ
一時たりとも忘れるな
column4:
Fix thy gaze upon the Dragon,  
never let remembrance wane...

column3:
竜を救え――
竜だけが我々に真実を語ることができるだろう
column4:
Deliver the Dragon from peril...  
For none but the Dragon  
may unveil the hidden truth...

column3: 竜力を――取り返さねば――
column4:
That which empowereth the Dragon...  
It must be wrested back ere ruin cometh...

column3:
笛があれば竜に勝てると
王子は信じているようだが――
column4:
The Prince trusteth  
in the flute's power,  
convinced it shall lay the Dragon low...

column3:
精霊竜は己を知っている
それ故、セシリーをここへ送り込んだのだ
――判断の正しさを見せてやれ
column4:
The Spirit Dragon knoweth itself well...  
Thus did it send Cecily unto this place.  
Show that its judgment standeth true.

column3: 義なき怒りは、身を滅ぼす――
column4:
Anger without righteousness 
consumeth the soul...

column3: 覚者の使命、ゆめゆめ忘れるな
column4:
Mind well thy mission as Arisen, 
and forget it not.

column3:
覚者よ
我が目となり、耳となり――頼むぞ
column4:
Arisen, bear witness for me...  
I charge thee with seeing and hearing true...

column3:
覚者よ
若い人間の不安定な心――
column4:
Arisen, heed my words...  
The wavering heart of youth  
calleth forth both hope and ruin...

column3:
覚者よ――
レスタニアを巡り、民の力となれ
我が加護を、あまねく伝えるのだ
column4:
Arisen...  
Traverse Lestania's breadth,  
stand as shield and succor to its people.
Make known mine boon,  
that none be deprived of its light.

column3:
覚者よ――
事を急げ――
邪気は日ごと強くなる――
column4:
Arisen...  
Make haste in thy task,  
ere the creeping malevolence consume all...

column3:
覚者よ――
我が力、レスタニアの外へは届かぬ
大地と人を味方にして力とするがいい
column4:
Arisen...  
Mine own power reacheth not  
beyond the bounds of Lestania.  
Let land and kin  
be thy allies, thy strength.

column3:
覚者よ――
新たなるポーンとの《戦徒の契り》を望むか
ならばその資格たる証――
<COL b92828><SPAI NAME> <SPAI NUM> 個</COL>を我に示せ
column4:
Arisen...  
Desirest thou another sworn ally  
in the guise of a Pawn?  
Then show the emblem  
that confirmeth thine entitlement—  
<COL b92828><SPAI NAME>, <SPAI NUM> in number</COL>  
and lay it before me.

column3:
覚者よ――
自らの出自を忘れるな
column4:
O Arisen―
Lose not the memory of whence thou cam'st...

column3:
覚者よ――
自らの闇を凝視せよ――
column4:
Arisen...  
Fix thine eyes upon the abyss within— 
face it, lest it consume thee whole.

column3: 覚者よ――人の時代を記憶し――愛でるがいい
column4:
Arisen...
Hold fast the memory of mortal days,
and cherish it within thine breast...

column3: 覚者よ――何用だ
column4:
Arisen...  
State thy purpose.

column3: 覚者よ、風となり大地を駆けよ――我が魂を運べ
column4:
Arisen...  
Be the tempest's stride,  
unfettered upon the soil—  
and deliver my essence unto its haven.

column3: 語るべき言葉――今はない
column4:
Words worthy of speech... 
there are none now.

column3:
過去に類無き空の火球――
理の盤石が揺らいでいるというのか――
column4:
A celestial inferno, unknown to history—  
can it be that the foundation 
of order doth falter?

column3:
道理を外れた世界も、これで理の中に
戻るだろう
column4:
A realm untethered from order 
shall, by this act, be restored unto balance...

column3:
邪悪な気の流れ――
おまえたちも感ずることが
できればいいのだが――
column4:
A dark flow of sinister force—  
If only thou couldst grasp its presence,  
ere calamity unfoldeth...

column3:
邪気が少しばかり薄らいだようだ
おかしい――
いや、息を潜めているつもりだろうか――
column4:
The foul presence recedeth,  
yet something seemeth amiss...  
No, 'tis not gone—  
merely holding its breath in stillness,  
watching, waiting...

column3:
鍛錬せよ
おまえたちは抜き身の刃――研がねば、朽ちる
column4:
Temper thy strength.
Thou art as bare steel—without honing,
thou shalt rust and crumble.

column3:
黒い鎧の騎士――
正体の見極めを急いでくれ
column4:
The knight enshrouded in sable plate—  
Haste thee to unravel the mystery of its form.

column3: 黒き鎧の災いは――厄介だぞ
column4:
The woe enshrined in dusk-wrought plate—  
a plight of dire consequence.

column3: （目を閉じ、何かを考えているようだ）
column4:
(With their eyes closed, they seem to be deep in
thought).

column3: ――感謝しなくてはなりませんね
column4: I have to say—thank you for that.

column3: 《ブラッドオーブ》がもっと手に入れば――
column4: If only I could get more Blood Orbs.

column3:
あなたは覚者です
苦難の道は――避けられません
column4:
You are an Arisen. 
The path of hardship cannot be
avoided.

column3:
いがみ合いが元気の源だという人もいるようですが
わたしにはまったく理解できません――
column4:
Some people seem to think that bickering is the
source of energy. I don't understand it at
all—I've never understood it.

column3:
いまは少し――心持ちが乱れています
お待ちを――
column4:
At this moment... my mind is uneasy.
Bear with me...

column3:
おかえりなさい
時に、皆さんとのご挨拶がまだでは？
column4:
Welcome back. By the way, have I greeted everyone
yet?

column3:
お手伝いできてうれしく思っています
これで押しも押されもせぬ立派な覚者ですね
column4: I'm happy to help. Now you're a well-known Arisen!

column3: こんにちは、覚者さん
column4: Hello, Arisen.

column3:
でも、白竜様に捧げられた命は
けして無駄にはなりません
column4:
But the lives dedicated to the White Dragon will
not be in vain.

column3:
もう、昔のようには戻れないのですか？
あなたはどんな印象を受けましたか？
column4:
Can we go back to the way things used to be? What
impression did you get?

column3:
わたしは契約のお手伝いをすることに
なっていますので、その時を楽しみにして
待っていますね
column4:
I'm supposed to help with the contract, so I'm
looking forward to that time.

column3:
アルヴァーには会えましたか？
早く契約までいけると良いですね
column4:
Did you get to meet Alvar? I hope you can get to
the contract soon.

column3: イリスのことを聞きましたが――
column4: I heard about Iris—

column3:
イリスの様子はやはり変ですね
わたしが話したがっていると伝えてくれますか？
column4:
Iris is still acting weird. Can you tell her I
want to talk to her?

column3: イリスは――心配ですね
column4: Iris—I'm worried.

column3:
エルフの仲間が面倒を見るということであれば
その方がメイリーフにとっては良いことなのかも
しれませんね――
column4:
If it means that the elf's friends will be taken
care of, it might be better for Mayleaf. Maybe—

column3:
オークの時のようにうまく想像できませんが
でも、白竜様が強い憎しみの気を放っている――
それだけはわかるのです
column4:
I can't envision it as well as I did with the
orcs. But The White Dragon is radiating a strong
aura of hatred—that much I know!

column3:
オークの臭いがするなどと騒いだりして
ごめんなさい
あの臭いが恐ろしくてならないのです
column4:
I'm sorry I made such a fuss about the smell of
orcs. I'm sorry... I'm afraid of that smell.

column3:
メイリーフの素性を知ったのですか？
あの一族は、今や、このレスタニアの宝石です
column4:
Have you learned of Mayleaf's true identity? That
family is now the jewel of this Lestania.

column3:
レオが白竜様を見つめていました
思い詰めているようでしたが――
column4:
Leo was staring at The White Dragon. He seemed to
be pondering—

column3:
下の街の皆さんが安心して暮らせるように
どうかよろしくお願いしますね
column4:
I hope everyone in the city below can live in
peace. Please do help us to do so.

column3:
争いのない世を望みながらも、我らの手は
戦の血で汚れていく――虚しきことです
column4:
We hope for a world without strife, 
but our hands are stained with the 
blood of war - a vain thing!

column3:
人は弱きもの――それゆえ
その力を紡ぎ、束ねんとするのです
column4:
Humans are weak—that is why we weave 
together and gather our strength.

column3: 今後もこのようなことが起こるのでしょうか――
column4: Will this continue to happen in the future—?

column3:
信じましょう
白竜様の大いなる加護を
column4:
Let us believe in the great blessings 
of the White Dragon.

column3:
大変な戦いだったと聞いています
断ち切られた人生も多かったと――
column4:
I hear it was a tough fight, and a lot of lives
were cut short—

column3:
少し、甘えてしまったかもしれません
これからは気をつけますね
column4:
I may have spoiled it a little. I'll be careful
from now on.

column3:
強く、澄み切った命でした
彼の命のあり方は素晴らしい
column4:
It was a strong, clear life. The way he lived his
life was amazing.

column3:
心の水面が平らかならば
本来、誰にでも竜の心は伝わるのです
column4:
With a tranquil mind's reflection,
anyone can hear the dragon's voice.

column3:
持ち去ったエルフの命――
敵はいったいどうするつもりでしょう
column4:
The life of an elf taken away... What will the
enemy do?

column3: 敵はディアマンテス――
column4: The enemy is Diamantes—

column3: 無理をきいてくれてありがとうございました
column4: Thank you for taking on the impossible.

column3:
白竜様がこっそりご加護をくださったのかも
しれませんね
column4:
Maybe the White Dragon has secretly given us a
blessing.

column3: 白竜様が回復される日までともに頑張りましょう
column4:
Until the day The White Dragon is restored, let's
do our best together.

column3:
白竜様が空を飛ぶお姿――
いつか見たいものですね
column4:
I hope to see the White Dragon flying in the
sky—one day!

column3:
白竜様の回復にはまだ時間がかかるようです
これからもわたしたちでお守りしなくては――
column4:
It will take some time for The White Dragon to
recover. We must continue to protect him—

column3:
白竜様の回復は一進一退――
特に石化の症状は油断がなりません
column4:
The White Dragon's recovery has been a step in
the right direction—The petrification symptoms can
be especially tricky!

column3: 白竜様の言葉こそ、導（しるべ）の光――
column4:
The words of the White Dragon are indeed 
the guiding light.

column3:
自由に振る舞う覚者が増えていますが
白竜様あっての覚者であることだけは
心に留めておいてください
column4:
There are more Arisen behaving freely, but please
always keep in mind that it is thanks to The White
Dragon that they exist.

column3:
覚者になってまだ日が浅いのに
《ブラッドオーブ》を持ち帰るなんて――
column4:
Even though it has only been a short time since
becoming an Arisen, I can't believe you brought
back a "Blood Orb."

column3:
語るべき何か――伝えるべき何か――
大切な言葉はいつも白竜様が教えてくれます
そう――わたし自身の言葉ではないのです
column4:
What to say... what to express...
The White Dragon guides me to proper words.
Indeed... they come from beyond me.

column3:
迷った時は、耳をすませてください
白竜様の教えがあなたを導くでしょう
column4:
When in doubt, listen, and let the teachings 
of The White Dragon guide you!

column3:
顔色が、すぐれぬようですね
どうかご自愛を
column4:
You don't look well. 
Please take care of yourself.

column3:
騎士団と覚者の揉め事に
巻き込まれてしまったと聞きました
大丈夫でしたか？
column4:
I heard that you got involved in a dispute
between the Knights order and the Arisen. Are you
okay?

column3:
魔物たちの標的になっても不思議では
ありません
どうか、気にしてあげてくださいね
column4:
No wonder they were the target of demons. Please,
please, please take care of them!

column3:
――と前向きに考えることにするよ
これも処世術と言えないこともないね
column4:
--I'm going to try to think positively and this
is another way to get by, I guess.

column3:
――！？　ああ、ごめんごめん
ちょっと考え事をね
column4:
—!? Ah, sorry, sorry. I was just thinking about
something.

column3:
"悪しき竜"は力だけを与えられた子供――
そんなふうに考えられないかな？
column4:
Can't we consider the "Evil Dragon" as a child
who has been bestowed with power alone?

column3:
《ブラッドオーブ》のことは
常に気にしておくといいよ
見つけると確実に一目置かれるからね
column4:
Remain watchful for those
Blood Orbs. Locating one
earns instant recognition.

column3:
ああ、ごめん
今は特に話すことはないよ
column4:
Oh, sorry. I don't really have anything 
to tell you right now.

column3:
あのゲートはフィンダムの竜の力が
生み出したものだ
僕らの心意気だけじゃどうにもならないよ
column4:
That gate is the result of the power of Phindym's
dragon. It can't be done with just our
determination alone.

column3:
あははは――
こんなに神殿の近くが戦場になるなんて――
ああ、怖かった
column4:
Ahahaha— Who would have thought that the area
near the temple would turn into a battlefield— Oh,
how scary.

column3:
あやふやとはいえ、ロイグの方が色々と
覚えているからね
その情報だけでも、ありがたいと思わなくちゃ
column4:
Even if uncertain, Loeg remembers various things,
so I must be grateful for that information alone.

column3:
あれこれ書物に当たっているけど
こんな危機はかつてなくて
白竜様と僕たちが初めてのようだ
column4:
I'm hitting various books and such, but this
crisis is unprecedented. It feels like The White
Dragon and we are experiencing something for the
first time.

column3:
いささか――怖いね
でも、ほら、白竜様がお待ちだよ
column4:
It's a little scary— but look, The White Dragon
is waiting for you.

column3:
いつ襲撃されてもおかしくないから
四方八方、気を抜かないようにね
column4:
Since we could be attacked at any time, let's
stay on high alert in all directions.

column3:
いや、君にも心配かけたよね
迎えに来てくれてありがとう
本当に感謝しているよ
column4:
No, I caused you to worry too, didn't I? Thank
you for coming to pick me up. I really appreciate
it.

column3:
おかしいよ――
第一のアークの調査は僕が担当したんだ
column4:
That's strange—I was in charge of investigating
the first Ark.

column3:
おや、疲れたのかい？
覚者も無敵ってわけじゃないんだな
column4:
Oh, you're tired, aren't you? 
I guess even the Arisen aren't 
invincible.

column3:
くれぐれも気をつけてくれよ
無事にここへ戻って来ると約束してほしい
君たちは歴史の証言者なんだからね
column4:
Please be careful and make sure to return here
safely. I want you to promise me that. You are
witnesses to history, after all.

column3:
ここでジッとしてはいられない
僕もメルゴダへ行く！　絶対行く！
column4:
I can't stay still here. I'm going to Mergoda!
I'm definitely going!

column3:
この世界は好きかい？
僕は好きだよ
知れば知るほど――もっと知りたくなる
column4:
Do you like this world? I do. 
The more you know—
the more you want to know.

column3:
これからフィンダムへの渡航者が増えるだろうね
もちろん僕も準備を進めているんだ
column4:
The number of travelers to Phindym is likely to
increase from now on, and of course, I am also
preparing for it.

column3: これは悪くない事だと思うよ
column4: I think this is not a bad thing.

column3:
これは王子なりによく考えた末の
行動だと思うよ
そうじゃないと、君たちから聞いていた
王子の印象と合わないからね
column4:
I think this is an action that the prince has
carefully considered. Otherwise, it wouldn't match
the impression of the prince that I have heard
from you.

column3:
ごめん！
アークの調査報告が最優先でね
あちこち気が回らないんだよ
column4:
Sorry! The Ark's investigation report is the top
priority. I can't focus on other things.

column3:
さあ、みんなが待ってるよ？
君がなんとかしてくれる――
そう思っている連中も多いはずさ
column4:
Come on, the guys are waiting for you, okay?
You'll handle it—I'm sure a lot of them think so.

column3: さあ、急いで
column4: Come on, hurry up.

column3:
さびしいね――
仲良くなれそうな気がしたんだけど――
いや、仲良かったよね――
column4:
It's lonely, isn't it... I felt like we could
become close... No, we were close, right...

column3:
すまないけど、少し考えたいことがあるんだ
後で話そうよ
column4:
Sorry, I just have a few things to 
think about. We can talk later.

column3:
ずっと考えているんだけど――
ディアマンテスは僕が跡を継ぎたがるって
本気で考えたのかな――
column4:
I keep thinking—that Diamantes wants me to follow
in his footsteps. Did he really think—?

column3:
そして、白竜様の回復を促す新しい方法も
見つかったみたいだ
これからも、もっと色々なことが
起こりそうな気がするよ
column4:
And it seems that a new method to encourage the
recovery of The White Dragon has been found. I
feel like more things are going to happen from now
on.

column3:
そして、良さそうなのがあれば
君たちにも伝えるからね
column4:
And if there is something good, I will also let
you guys know.

column3:
その心の暗い部分に黒騎士が
入り込んだ――か
column4:
Did the Black Knight enter the dark depths of
your heart?

column3:
その目的を果たしたあとは
どんな顔をして仲間のところへ戻る気で
いるんだろうね
あまり考えていないのかな
column4:
After achieving that goal, I wonder what
expression they will have when they return to
their comrades. I wonder if they haven't thought
about it much.

column3:
それなのに僕は――
悔やんでも悔やみきれないよ
column4: And yet, I can't help but regret and regret.

column3:
それにしてもあのロイグがね――
心根のいい奴に思えたけどなあ
僕の人を見る目もまだまだだね
column4:
That Loeg, though... He seemed like a
good-hearted guy. I still have a long way to go in
judging people.

column3:
そんなことしている場合じゃないと思うけど
時間をもらえるのはありがたいことだから
僕は僕で独自に調べようと思っている
column4:
I don't think this is the time for that, but it's
nice to have some time. I am thinking of
researching on my own.

column3:
だから僕は、こっち側の人たちと神殿の
架け橋になろうと思うんだ
column4:
That's why I want to become a bridge between the
people on this side and the temple.

column3:
だとしたら、哀れだね
出会ったばかりの僕しか後継者候補は
いないのか――ってさ
column4:
If that's the case, it's pitiful, isn't it? Are
there really no other candidates for the successor
besides me, someone you just met?

column3:
ちょうど君が覚者になった頃からこれまでとは
少し違う事件が起こるようになってきた
オークの活動が活発になったり――
ほら、アークの出現もそうだね
column4:
Since you became an Arisen, there have been
different incidents occurring from before until
now. The Orcs have become more active, and, well,
the appearance of the Ark, too.

column3:
でも、君が持ち帰った古文書は面白そうで――
まずいな――ジョゼフ様に叱られるよ
column4:
But, the old document you took home seems
interesting... Uh-oh... I'm going to get scolded
by Joseph, aren't I?

column3:
となると、レスタニアの混乱がこの程度で
済んでいるのは、とてつもなく運が
いいのかもしれないね
column4:
If that's the case, it might be incredibly lucky
that the chaos in Lestania has been settled to
this extent.

column3: とにもかくにも今はネド王子だね
column4: In any case, you are Prince Nedo now.

column3:
どうだい？
覚者の生活には慣れたかな？
column4:
How about it? Are you used to the life of an
Arisen?

column3:
ひとつだけわかったのは――
"悪しき竜"はすぐに君たちを亡き者に
するつもりはないということ
column4:
The only thing I understood is that the "Evil
Dragon" has no intention of taking you out
immediately.

column3: まあ、今は生きのびてくれることを祈ろう
column4: Well, let's pray that they'll survive.

column3: また何か起こりそうな気配だね
column4: It feels like something is about to happen again.

column3:
まだ正体はわからないんだけど
どこかに落ちたらしいんだ
うわさか何か聞いてないかい？
column4:
I still do not know what it truly is, but it
seems to have fallen somewhere. Have you heard any
rumors or something?

column3:
まだ読み切れていない古文書もあるし
ここまで実際に体験したことを
評価し直す必要があるかもしれない
column4:
There are some ancient documents that have not
yet been fully read, and I may need to reevaluate
what I've actually done so far.

column3:
まだ読んでいない書物、まだ試していない実験――
心残りがあるうちは、死ねないよ
column4:
Books unopened, tests unconducted -
death must wait while these
unfinished matters remain.

column3:
もう友達をなくすのは絶対に嫌だから
思ったことは口にするつもりだよ
column4:
I absolutely don't want to lose any more friends,
so I intend to speak my mind.

column3:
もしかしたら、僕が覚者の力に
なれるのかもしれないな――
column4:
Perhaps, I may be able to become a powerful
Arisen...

column3:
やあ、新人さん
最初は誰彼かまわず顔を売っておくといいよ
column4:
Hello, newcomer.
Early on, it's best to introduce
yourself to everyone.

column3:
やっぱり僕は生きているキースヒルトと
もっと話したかったよ――
column4:
I knew I wanted to talk more with Kieshildt. I
just wish I could have told you more—

column3:
よく考えると、このレスタニアでも
竜の不調は続いているわけだよね
column4:
When I think about it, even in this Lestania, the
dragon's condition continues to worsen, doesn't
it?

column3: ん？　どうしたんだい？
column4: Hmm? What's wrong?

column3:
アッカーシェランか
自然環境はこっちとほぼ同じなんだね
つまり、理と竜の世界ということか
column4:
Is this Acre Selund? The natural environment here
is almost the same, right? In other words, it's a
world of order and dragons.

column3:
アッカーシェランで"悪しき竜"との
全面戦争が始まるのかな
column4:
Is a full-scale war against the "Evil Dragon"
about to begin in Acre Selund?

column3:
アッカーシェランとも、フィンダムのような
友好的な関係になれるといいね
column4:
I hope we can establish a friendly relationship
with Acre Selund, just like with Phindym.

column3:
アッカーシェランに灯った希望の火を
消してはいけないよ
column4:
Do not extinguish the flame of hope that has been
lit in Acre Selund!

column3:
アッカーシェランの状況は良くないみたいだけど
それでも君たちはレスタニアの代表なんだ
column4:
The situation in Acre Selund doesn't seem to be
good, but even so, you are representatives of
Lestania.

column3:
アーク調査の報告書がまだだというのに
古文書の解読まで――
column4:
Despite the fact that the report on the Ark
investigation is not yet complete, up until the
deciphering of the ancient documents—

column3:
イリスとは話したかい？
なんだか避けられているような気が
しないでもないんだけど――
column4:
Did you talk to Iris? I can't help but feel like
she's avoiding me.

column3: ガルドリンには特に強く言っておかないと
column4: I need to make sure to tell Gurdolin firmly.

column3:
ゲートの継続性について
もう少し確信が得られないと
僕は向こうへは行けないな
column4:
Regarding the sustainability of the gate, I
cannot go over there without a little more
certainty.

column3:
ジョゼフ様がまたなんか言ってるだろ？
人を疑うのが性分なんだね
column4:
Joseph is saying something again, right? It's in
his nature to suspect others.

column3:
ジョゼフ様の助手になって以来初めての
大仕事を仰せつかって、その計画をね――
ふふふ――
column4:
Since becoming Joseph's assistant, this is the
first big job I've been entrusted with, and I am
now tasked with the planning... hehehe...

column3:
ジョゼフ様の話を聞いていると
まるで僕たちがフィンダムへの侵略者のように
思えてくるよ
column4:
When listening to Joseph's story, it feels as if
we are invaders to Phindym.

column3:
セシリーは深手を負っている
致命傷がなければ命は助かるだろうけど
回復には長い時間がかかるよ
column4:
Cecily has suffered a serious injury. If there is
no fatal wound, she should survive, but recovery
will take a long time.

column3:
ディアマンテス――
イリスは確かにそう言ってたよね？
column4: Diamantes - Iris did say that, right?

column3:
ディアマンテスに対抗する錬金術師が
ちゃんといたことがうれしくてね
column4:
I am happy that there was an alchemist who could
oppose Diamantes.

column3:
ネド王子と解放軍が合流したんだ
敵の警戒も厳しくなるだろうね
column4:
Prince Nedo and the liberation army have joined
forces. Enemy vigilance will also intensify, I
suppose.

column3:
ネド王子はたしかにまだ子供だけど
聞く限り、無茶はしない印象だよ
column4:
Prince Nedo is certainly still a child, but from
what I hear, he gives the impression of not doing
anything reckless.

column3:
フィンダムで起こったことを記録して
後世に残そうと思っているんだけど――
column4:
I want to record what happened in Phindym and
leave it for future generations to see—

column3:
フィンダムを竜力が巡る仕組みは
こっちとは少し違うようだね
column4:
The mechanism of Dragon Force circulating around
Phindym seems to be a little different from here.

column3:
メイリーフを連れ出したフードの女って
やっぱり彼女だよな――
column4:
The woman in the hood who took Mayleaf out... I
knew it was her.

column3:
レオが匿っているという人と話せれば
もっと色々と分かるのだろうけど
今はそれよりも侵食魔退治だね
まったく、次から次へと――
column4:
If I could talk to the person Leo is hiding with,
I would probably understand more. But right now,
it's more about defeating the Corruption.
Seriously, it's one thing after another—

column3:
レスタニアの命運は尽きる寸前だった――
あはは――今になって脚が震えるよ
column4:
Lestania's fate was on the brink of
exhaustion—Ahaha—My legs are trembling now.

column3:
レスタニアは平和なものさ
気分転換に散歩でもどうだい？
column4:
Lestania is a peaceful place. How about taking a
walk for a change of mood?

column3:
レスタニア中の海図がこの神殿に
集まることになっているんだ
船乗りたちと一緒に、その海図とにらめっこさ
column4:
The charts of all of Lestania are to be gathered
here in this temple. I'll be poring over them with
the sailors.

column3:
ロイグが早くよくなることを祈るよ
まあ、ロイグのためというよりは
かなり利己的な理由だけどね
column4:
I hope Loeg gets better soon. Well, it's not so
much for Loeg's sake but rather for quite selfish
reasons.

column3:
ロイグはガラダ族長たちのことを
快く思っていなかった
いや、逆恨みしていたという感じかな？
column4:
Loeg did not have a favorable opinion of the
Gearóid tribal leaders. No, it's more like he held
a grudge against them, I guess?

column3:
不安と期待が入り交じるこの気持ち――
説明が難しいね
column4:
This feeling of anxiety, mixed with
anticipation—It's hard to explain.

column3:
今のジョゼフ様は猜疑心の塊だよ
何を言い出しても驚かないことだね
column4:
Joseph is currently a bundle of suspicion. It's
not surprising no matter what he says.

column3:
今のジョゼフ様は猜疑心の塊だよ
何を言い出しても驚かないことだね
column4:
Joseph is currently a bundle of suspicion. It's
not surprising no matter what he says.

column3:
今は解放軍と一緒に王都奪回の戦いに
専念するのがいいと思うよ
column4:
I think it's best to focus on the battle to
recapture the Royal Capital with the Liberation
Army.

column3:
今度の調査だって僕が行けば前回との
比較ができたのに――
意見も全然聞いてもらえないし――はぁ
column4:
If I were to go on this investigation, I would
have been able to compare it to the last time—but
I don't get listened to at all—sigh.

column3:
今朝、ぶつけて爪が欠けてしまってね
嫌な予感がするんだ
column4:
I bumped it this morning and chipped a nail. I
have a bad feeling about this.

column3:
他の人も思いは同じだと思うよ
つまり――
僕が言いたいのは、レオの後任は大変だけど
頑張ってくれってことさ
column4:
I think other people feel the same way. In other
words— What I want to say is, it's tough to be
Leo's successor, but I hope you will do your best.

column3:
会議だなんて――
これは時間がかかるよ
column4: A meeting? Oh, this is going to take some time.

column3:

調査は何も終わってないからね

more thoroughly. Although the fighting may have
come to a halt, the investigation is far from
over.

have known...

signs were there. There was no need to hesitate...

confusion. In other words, this busyness is also
on my side.

column3:

what?

column3:

seems it's still too early. I'll wait a little
longer for the situation to settle down.

because making a fuss here might put me in an even
more troublesome position.

power. There was no balance... No, no, no, that's
not the point!

split—I believe that this way of thinking Leads to
peaceful coexistence.

a temporary power. I don't think it will last
long.

forget that.

there as soon as possible.

we have in common.

I don't have any ambitions, don't you?

Dragon, the knowledge, the wisdom that Kieshildt
knew—it's all gone.

Gurdolin say you went to.

waiting for good news!

open sea.

be resolved.

shoulders. Just between you and me— Master Joseph
is testing me.

Corruption?

island. I hope we can make a good report, but
there are quite a few monsters.

column3:

salute you.

column3:

Thinking outside the box. 
That's what transforms
ordinary into extraordinary.

column3:

待っていても発見は無いからね

When you have an idea, act on it 
immediately!

frustrating.

Leo. Why is he absent at a time like this?

Selund; the situation can change depending on the
prince's movements.

Capital is over.

considered rough individuals. Since we are
infiltrating their headquarters, be careful with
your words and actions.

the dragon.

scrutinize them.

knights.

prepared for counterattacks.

thinking about is who was behind it

buzz, right? Regardless of their identity, they

prepare ourselves for anything, okay?

right person for the right job? 
Yes, I attack with wisdom, not
military prowess.

黒騎士の剣を取り戻して

Knight.

Growth》 at this level, it seems there are no
abilities to be raised.
Are you going to use the orb with your current
job?

column3: これは吉兆だ――良きことが始まる――
column4: This is a good omen - good things are beginning.

column3:
これは強い竜力が篭められた宝珠だな
この宝珠の力を解放して白竜に捧げれば
おまえの《竜力の継承》は完全なものとなるだろう
column4:
This is a jewel imbued with strong Dragon Force.
If you offer it to the White Dragon, your 《Dragon
Force Augmentation》 will become complete.

column3:
これほどの嵐――
史書の編纂が始まって以来なかったことだ
後世のために、詳細な記録を
残しておかねば
column4:
Such a storm―― It has never happened since the
beginning of the compilation of historical
records. For future generations, detailed records
must be kept.

column3:
これを使えば、今のジョブの
スキルやアビリティを
解放することができる
column4:
By using this, you will be able to unlock the
skills and abilities of your current job.

column3:
これを使えば、今のジョブをLV.80に上げ
スキルやアビリティに関しても、特殊なもの以外
上限まで引き上げることができる
――もちろん、ジョブポイントも上限まで貯まる
column4:
With this, you can raise your current job to
level 80.
You can also raise the limit for skills and
abilities, except for special ones.
And of course, job points can be accumulated up
to the new limit.

column3:
これを使えば、今のジョブを上げ
スキルやアビリティに関しても、特殊なもの以外
上限まで引き上げることができる
column4:
With this, you can raise your current job
and your skills and abilities to the
maximum, except for special ones.

column3:
これを持ってきたということは、今のジョブで
《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を使うのか？
column4:
If you brought this, does that mean you will use
《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 with your current job?

column3:
こんなことを言うとまた嫌われるのだろうが
アッカーシェラン側が口裏を合わせて
我々を騙そうとしている可能性も
皆無ではない
column4:
I may be disliked again for saying this, but
there is a possibility that Acre Selund is
conspiring and trying to deceive us.

column3:
ごくろうだったな
ゆっくりと休んでくれ
column4:
You've worked hard.
Please take a rest.

column3:
さあ、メルゴダへ行くんだ
向こうで誰と話――誰と戦うか
それは自分で決めればいい
column4:
Now, you're going to Mergoda. Who to talk to over
there - who to fight. You should decide that for
yourself.

column3:
さあ、今のうちに休んだり装備を見直したり――
いよいよ決戦だぞ
column4:
Now, while you're at it, get some rest and review
your equipment-- It's time for the showdown!

column3:
さあ、早くフィンダムに行ってやれ
無事を信じているとはいえ、ガルドリンの安否も
気になるところだ
column4:
I have no words, nothing I can do, but pray for
your safety.

column3:
さあ、行け覚者よ
白竜様の加護があらんことを――
column4:
Now, go forth, Arisen
May you be blessed by the White Dragon's grace.

column3:
しかし――
もう少し仕える者たちを大切にせねば
国を治めるのは難しいだろうな
column4:
However...
If we do not value and appreciate those who serve
us a little more,
it will be difficult to govern the country.

column3:
しかし、敵に心奪われた者をこれまでどおり
信頼するわけにもいくまい
column4:
However, I cannot continue to trust someone who
has been swayed by the enemy as before.

column3:
しかしそろそろおまえたちだけでも
気持ちを竜退治に切り替えた方が
良いのかもしれんぞ
column4:
However, perhaps it would be better for just you
guys to start shifting your feelings towards
defeating the dragon.

column3:
しばらくは、おまえたちの判断で
臨機応変に対応してくれ
column4:
For a while, please handle things flexibly and
adapt as you see fit.

column3:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい
column4:
All the 《Dragon Force Augmentation》 have been
completed. Confirm what kind of power you have
obtained!

column3:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい
column4:
All the 《Dragon Force Augmentation》 have been
completed. Confirm what kind of power you have
obtained!

column3:
そういえば、おまえはすでに
かなりの礎に触れ、エリアに貢献して
きたのではないか？
column4:
Come to think of it, you've already touched
quite a few Portcrystals and contributed
to the area, haven't you?

column3:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない
column4:
I see. If you're satisfied, I have nothing more
to say.

column3:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない
column4:
I see. If you're satisfied, I have nothing more
to say.

column3:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい
column4:
I see.
It's valuable, so be sure to think carefully and
use it.

column3:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい
column4:
I see.
It's valuable, so be sure to think carefully and
use it.

column3:
そう信じているのだが、戦ってばかりでは
事態の把握は不可能
やはり戦力の分割は避けられぬわ
column4:
I believe that if we keep fighting all the time,
it will be impossible to grasp the situation. I
still cannot avoid the division of forces.

column3:
それが狙いだというのなら
思い上がりも甚だしいわい
column4:
If that's your intention,
it's extremely presumptuous.

column3:
それでは、宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
column4:
Now, let us release the power of the Orb. Quiet
your mind and close your eyes.

column3:
それでは宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
column4:
Now let us release the power of the Orb
--Quiet your mind and close your eyes.
